name: Flax Sandwich Buns
ingredients: Cooking spray or additional oil for greasing
utensils: Long, thin knife for splitting buns

instructions.en: Preheat the oven to 325°F (165°C). Grease 6 cups of a muffin top pan.
instructions.sk: Predhrejte rúru na 165°C. Vymastite 6 jamiek formy na muffiny.
instructions.ja: オーブンを325°F（165°C）に予熱します。マフィントップパンの6つのカップに油を塗ります。

instructions.en: In a small bowl, add just enough water to the dry minced onion to moisten. Let stand until softened.
instructions.sk: V malej miske pridajte k sušenej cibuľke len toľko vody, aby sa navlhčila. Nechajte postáť, kým nezmäkne.
instructions.ja: 小さなボウルに乾燥ミンチオニオンを入れ、湿る程度の水を加えます。柔らかくなるまで置いておきます。

instructions.en: In a mixing bowl, combine flax meal, parmesan cheese, onion powder, baking powder, Splenda, and caraway seeds (if using).
instructions.sk: V miske zmiešajte ľanové semienka, parmezán, cibuľový prášok, prášok do pečiva, Splendu a rascu (ak používate).
instructions.ja: ボウルにフラックスミール、パルメザンチーズ、オニオンパウダー、ベーキングパウダー、スプレンダ、キャラウェイシード（使用する場合）を入れて混ぜます。

instructions.en: Add the softened minced onions, eggs, water, and oil to the dry ingredients. Mix well to form a batter.
instructions.sk: K suchým prísadám pridajte zmäknutú cibuľku, vajcia, vodu a olej. Dobre premiešajte, aby vzniklo cesto.
instructions.ja: 柔らかくなったミンチオニオン、卵、水、油を乾燥材料に加えます。よく混ぜて生地を作ります。

instructions.en: Pour the batter evenly into the 6 greased muffin top pan cups.
instructions.sk: Cesto rovnomerne nalejte do 6 vymastených jamiek formy na muffiny.
instructions.ja: 生地を6つの油を塗ったマフィントップパンのカップに均等に注ぎます。

instructions.en: Allow to cool. To serve, split the buns horizontally to make two halves using a long, thin knife.
instructions.sk: Nechajte vychladnúť. Pri podávaní rozdeľte žemle vodorovne na dve polovice pomocou dlhého tenkého noža.
instructions.ja: 冷ましてから、長く薄いナイフを使って水平に半分に切り分けて提供します。

notes: These Flax Sandwich Buns are a low-carb, high-fiber alternative to traditional bread buns. They're rich in omega-3 fatty acids from the flax meal and have a savory flavor from the parmesan cheese and onion. The optional caraway seeds can add a rye-like flavor. These buns are sturdy enough for sandwiches but can also be used as a side for soups or salads. For best results, store in an airtight container in the refrigerator.
